attributes.action: To stop men being wrongly accused and done for domestic violence
attributes.additional_details: Things need to change too many innocent men are been wrongly charged and found guilty of domestic violence and stop the stereotypes in the justice system women can't just going around wrongly accusing men for domestic violence just to get out of a relationship
attributes.background: To stop innocent men being done for domestic violence

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand you're concerned about unsafe convinctions but we're not sure what you'd like the Government or Parliament do to change this.   

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
